text: @KassyDillon Yep, With all this Memorial Day non-social distancing and these riotit for the last 5  days, going to be very interesting to see what happens in the next couple of weeks. I’m going to say NO spike in COVID-19 . And it’s odd we haven’t heard ANYTHING via NEWS MEDIA AT ALL.
